title: Maldives - Credit Rating
description: Moody's credit rating for Maldives was last set at Caa1 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Maldives was last reported at B- with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Maldives thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Maldives as reported by major credit rating agencies.
